text: @SpeakerPelosi tRUMP ordered immigrants on life saving medical treatment to be deported in 30 days.He denied flu/mumps vaccinations for immigrants in ICE detention centers. Now DHS believes COVID19 outbreak from there endangering the U.S. population.
